## Dashboard.render() method

Renders to the screen. It will rerender the existing component if already initialized.

Signature:

```typescript
render(Component: any): void;
```

Decorators:

`@bind`

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description            |
| --------- | ---- | ---------------------- |
| Component | any  | The body of the screen |

Returns:

void
